greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A051731 * A115361.
comment: The inverse Moebius transform of the first column of A115361 which is A209229 gives the first column of this sequence.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275
formula: T(n,k) = A001511(n/k) for k | n, T(n,k) = 0 otherwise. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 04 2018
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 15}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 08 2020, from PARI *)
xref: Row sums are A129628 (inverse Moebius transform of A001511).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 10 2007
